data.title: Where to Watch High School Sports
data.meta_description: Big Time Sports is dedicated to providing the very best in high school sports coverage in 1.5 Million homes from Cuyahoga to Gurnsey Counties. We produce 2 weekly sports talk shows featuring high school coaches and players. Our "Southern Network" can be seen Weds @ 7pm and Friday @ 10pm. Our "Northern Network" show can be seen Thursdays @ 7:30pm and Saturday mornings at 8:30pm. To watch the Show, tune to Cable Channels MCT 128 & TW 989 (Stark - Wayne Counties) and TW 15 (Tuscarawas - Carroll - Holmes Counties). Off-Air Views North 29.1 and South 39.1.
data.text:
Looking for the ultimate destination to catch all the action?

Cable Subscribers: Tune in on Spectrum Channel 15 and Channel 989 in Northeast Ohio, or Massillon Cable Channel 128.

No Cable? No Worries: Watch the excitement from anywhere around the globe! Simply go online to WIVMTV.COM.

Antenna TV Users: Set your channels to 29 and 39.
